entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: where I put it
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it‚Äù! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.39 ‚Üí $0.29 [$0.29 ~ $0.59]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • Small PackÔºö$1.00
  • Big packÔºö$4.99
  • Medium packÔºö$2.29

Application Description

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar ‚Äî your personal guide to the planet‚Äôs most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 ‚Äî World Wetlands Day March 3 ‚Äî World Wildlife Day March 21 ‚Äî International Day of Forests March 22 ‚Äî World Water Day March 23 ‚Äî World Meteorological Day April 7 ‚Äî World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 ‚Äî Earth Day May 22 ‚Äî International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 ‚Äî World Environment Day June 8 ‚Äî World Oceans Day June 17 ‚Äî World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 ‚Äî World Nature Conservation Day September 16 ‚Äî International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 ‚Äî World Animal Day October 13 ‚Äî International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 ‚Äî International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 ‚Äî International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ghost Detector: Haunted Radar
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.19]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user. ‚Ä¢ This application might scare you. ‚Ä¢ All sensors are on one page. ‚Ä¢ A real radar to track anomalies. ‚Ä¢ Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector. ‚Ä¢ Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off. ‚Ä¢ More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them. Warning: If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately. Disclaimer: Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Calorie Counter PRO MyNetDiary
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • MyNetDiary PremiumÔºö$69.99 ‚Üí $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $69.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • MyNetDiary PremiumÔºö$8.99

Application Description

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging ‚Äî all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAY‚Ä¶ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE ‚Ä¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Health‚Äôs Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. ‚Ä¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. ‚Ä¢ Praised by The New York Times as ‚Äúsimpler, quicker, and better-looking‚Äù than other apps. ‚Ä¢ Featured in Today‚Äôs Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS ‚Ä¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. ‚Ä¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. ‚Ä¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. ‚Ä¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS ‚Ä¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week ‚Ä¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: ‚Ä¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. ‚Ä¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. ‚Ä¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. ‚Ä¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. ‚Ä¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked ‚Ä¢ Plan macros ‚Ä¢ Full set of charts ‚Ä¢ Timestamps ‚Ä¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: ‚Ä¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. ‚Ä¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. ‚Ä¢ Macros planning and cycling. ‚Ä¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. ‚Ä¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. ‚Ä¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. ‚Ä¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Subscription Terms: The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dumb Phone: Minimal Launcher
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [Free ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

Application Description

Dumb Phone is a minimalist apps launcher designed to help you reduce screen time by keeping your home screen clean and free of notifications. Fully customizable, Dumb Phone lets you select the apps that are most important to you and display them in a simple, minimalistic interface on your home screen. Whether you prefer dark or light mode, this launcher works well with both, allowing you to choose the view that suits you best. Stay focused and simplify your digital life with Dumb Phone.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game AccessÔºö$19.99

Application Description

Download and play GTA III - Definitive for up to thirty minutes as a free trial. Purchase the full game as a one-time, in-app purchase to play without any time limits. GTA+ Members can enjoy unlimited access while subscribed for as long as it is included in GTA+. It all starts in Liberty City. With revolutionary freedom to go anywhere and jack anyone, Grand Theft Auto III puts the center of the criminal underworld at your fingertips, if you have enough guts to take it. Rockstar Games, Inc. 622 Broadway, New York, NY, 10012. ¬© 2001‚Äì2023. Rockstar Games, Grand Theft Auto, Grand Theft Auto III and R* Logo are marks/logos/copyrights of Take-Two Interactive. entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö$99.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2Ôºö$14.99
  • Pro Tier 1Ôºö$9.99
  • RadarScope Pro SubscriptionÔºö$9.99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether you‚Äôre scanning for a mesocyclone‚Äôs tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane‚Äôs eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar‚Äôs scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: ‚Ä¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany ‚Ä¢ 6-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Two built-in providers for radar data ‚Ä¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US ‚Ä¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia ‚Ä¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes ‚Ä¢ Inspector and distance tools ‚Ä¢ Color palette options for radar data ‚Ä¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration ‚Ä¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting ‚Ä¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL ‚Ä¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use ‚Ä¢ Support for widgets and complications ‚Ä¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: ‚Ä¢ 30-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes ‚Ä¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada ‚Ä¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions ‚Ä¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks ‚Ä¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US ‚Ä¢ Local storm reports in the US ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support ‚Ä¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) ‚Ä¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: ‚Ä¢ Everything in Pro Tier One ‚Ä¢ 50-frame radar loops ‚Ä¢ A third provider for US radar data ‚Ä¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive ‚Ä¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products ‚Ä¢ NSSL‚Äôs Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products ‚Ä¢ NCEP‚Äôs Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products ‚Ä¢ Surface observations ‚Ä¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US ‚Ä¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive ‚Ä¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps ‚Ä¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA ‚Ä¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices ‚Ä¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

  • Data Level BetaÔºö$8.99
  • Data Level AlphaÔºö$119.99
  • RadarOmega - Alpha MonthlyÔºö$11.99

Application Description

Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm. Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent. RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea. Base Application -NEW Warning Display Dialog -NEW Hi-Res Storm Relative Velocity -MRMS Reflectivity -Hi-Res Single Site Radar Data -30 Frames of Data -7 Day Radar History -Lightning Detection/Animation -24 Hour Storm Reports -SPC Convective Outlooks & Watches -NHC Tropical Suite & Hurricane Hunter -WPC Excessive Rainfall Outlooks -Mesoscale Discussions (Severe, Winter, & Precip.) -CPC Temp. & Precip. Outlooks -Fire Weather Outlooks & Drought Monitor -WPC Winter Forecasts & WSSI -METARS -Real-Time NWS Storm-Based Warnings -Non-Precip Watches/Warnings for USA -Flash Animation & In-App Sound Alert for All Alerts -WPC Surface Analysis -Buoy Data & Tide Forecasts -NEXRAD Hail History -Spotter Network Locations -Power Outage Layer -Map Type Customization -Detailed City & Road Network -15 Custom Locations with a Linked RadarOmega Account -Drawing, Data Viewer, & Distance Tools -Storm Track Drawing Tool -Share Screenshot & Video -Push Notifications for All Storm-Based Watches/Warnings Using GPS Location -Access to cyclonePORT Network Gamma -Hi-Res Satellite Data -Lightning Detection/Animation, METARS, & GLM for Mesoscale & Storm-Based Satellite Sectors -National Digital Forecast Database -Access to Project MesoVort -75 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar with 30 Frames -Smoothing for Radar/Satellite -30 Day Radar History -6 Month Storm Report Archive -3D Radar/Satellite -Upload 3 Custom Color Tables -30 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -2 Custom Location Lists -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts Using GPS Location ONLY (max of 8 at a time) Beta *Everything in Gamma PLUS* -MRMS Data -150 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 50 Frames -Smoothing for MRMS -90 Day Radar History -5 Year Storm Report Archive -3D MRMS -Upload 8 Custom Color Tables -75 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -5 Custom Location Lists Alpha *Everything in Beta PLUS* -Volumetric Radar -Model Data with Contours for HRRR, NAM3KM, NAM12KM, RAP, GFS, ECMWF, HWRF, & HMON -250 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 100 Frames -Quad View Radar/Satellite on iPad & Desktop with 50 Frames -Smoothing for Models -90 Day Radar History -10 Year Storm Report Archive -Upload 30 Custom Color Tables -150 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -10 Custom Location Lists -1 Site Lightning Monitoring with Custom Range Zones -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts for up to 3 Custom Locations and GPS Locations (max of 8 at a time) Additional Add-Ons -Rapid Sweep Subscriptions are maintained through the iOS App Store. We will work with our customers however, refunds must be done through the iOS App Store. Please be sure to reach out to our support team if you have any problems, questions, or concerns. For Support- You can create a ticket and we will resolve it as soon as possible: https://radaromegawx.supportbee.io/portal/sign_in See our Terms of Service below: https://www.radaromega.com/terms.php

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [Free ~ $5.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. entry.title: Remote, Mouse & Keyboard Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$20.00 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $20.00]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

App offers remote control for Mac or PC, with a mouse, keyboard, and media controls. Great if you connect your computer to the TV or projector, to control from a sofa or bed. In 2013, I created this app to control my Mac Mini connected to a big-screen TV in my living room. In 2016 I quit my job and became an indie developer, and now my sole focus is on building my apps. The app has been downloaded more than 2,000,000 times over the years and has favorable reviews. MAIN FEATURES ¬∑ Remote Mouse and Keyboard ¬∑ Media Controls for popular apps and websites ¬∑ Live view of your computer screen ¬∑ System Commands: shut down, restart, sleep, etc. ¬∑ Launch and Quit apps ¬∑ Use Siri to control your computer ¬∑ Control Sound Output / Screen Mirroring [Mac only] ADVANCED FEATURES ¬∑ Create Control Panels ¬∑ Add Custom Actions using AppleScript / PowerShell QUICK AND EASY SETUP ¬∑ Install the free helper app from https://cherpake.com/get ¬∑ Connect both devices to the same network SECURITY The app uses standard security measures like HTTPS to communicate and only works on your local network. Whenever an unknown device tries to establish a connection with your computer, the app presents a dialog for you to choose to allow or deny it. REQUIREMENTS ¬∑ Mac with macOS 10.10 or newer ¬∑ PC with Windows 7 SP1 or newer ¬∑ Latest helper app (available at https://cherpake.com/get) ¬∑ Shared network connection (WiFi or Personal Hotspot), see https://cherpake.com/connect FREE TRIAL This app is a hidden gem that most people don't know they need. Those are not my words, just one of the latest app reviews. Still not convinced, download and install the free app and use the free trial to see it yourself. Available at https://bit.ly/mpcrc
